name: Triple C Studios (Rapid Prototype)
description:
Triple C Studios is a rapid prototype of a Game Dev Simulator for a Uni project.

Run Full Screen!

There might be a bug or two and WebGL messed up a couple of the colors for some reason, but it isn't too bad for a very quick prototype.  

Feedback welcome.

by Simon Gillespie & Harry Kalogirou

SAE GDS212 - Prototype 4 - Simulation
